en_us: Adds the shamir 'Fulcio' to Metallurgy. It allows you to place blocks in mid-air! This also enables you to choose the orientation of blocks like logs without needing a supporting block.
Fulcio changes block placement. While sneaking, blocks can be placed in mid-air.
The Fulcio Shamir is found on Barimium Bands. It can be placed onto compasses.\n\nHolding the tool and sneaking will create a temporary space where blocks can be placed.
